name: Perpetual Dynasty
description:
The goal of this game is: "Find a good partner to prosper your dynasty!".

Every year that passes, your statistics will increase or decrease depending on various factors. Moreover, you will have a chance to find a partner and have a child!

Each character will have random traits. The traits can be either good or bad! Having charm means you will have more success to find a partner, being more fertile means you will have more chance to have a baby...

Be careful, your children will inherit part of your traits and your partner traits. 

Made for the GDL June Gene Jam.
